LanguageData.armorerInspiration_0.label: Armorer Inspiration
LanguageData.armorerInspiration_0.desc: A armorer in one of your settlements contacts you. He explains that he has been struck with great inspiration and requests silver for supplies to create you armor worthy of your empire. He plans to give it to you as a token of his loyalty.
LanguageData.armorerInspiration_1-1.label: Armorer Inspiration
LanguageData.armorerInspiration_1-1.desc: The armorer is working on your gift...
LanguageData.armorerInspiration_1-2.label: Armorer Inspiration
LanguageData.armorerInspiration_1-2.desc: The armorer is working on your gift...
LanguageData.armorerInspiration_1-3.label: Armorer Inspiration
LanguageData.armorerInspiration_1-3.desc: The armorer is working on your gift...
LanguageData.blacksmithInspiration_0.label: Blacksmith Inspiration
LanguageData.blacksmithInspiration_0.desc: A blacksmith in one of your settlements contacts you. He explains that he has been struck with great inspiration and requests silver for supplies to create you a weapon worthy of your empire. He plans to give it to you as a token of his loyalty.
LanguageData.blacksmithInspiration_1-1.label: Blacksmith Inspiration
LanguageData.blacksmithInspiration_1-1.desc: The blacksmith is working on your gift...
LanguageData.blacksmithInspiration_1-2.label: Blacksmith Inspiration
LanguageData.blacksmithInspiration_1-2.desc: The blacksmith is working on your gift...
LanguageData.blacksmithInspiration_1-3.label: Blacksmith Inspiration
LanguageData.blacksmithInspiration_1-3.desc: The blacksmith is working on your gift...
LanguageData.deathInTheFamily.label: Death In The Family
LanguageData.deathInTheFamily.desc: A figure of high-importance and connection to your capital in a settlement has been assassinated. Some people on the streets are spreading that it was you who caused their death. -4 happiness a day.
LanguageData.denseWildlife.label: Dense Wildlife
LanguageData.denseWildlife.desc: There is a great amount of animals roaming the region. +1 animals base production.
LanguageData.drugTrade_0.label: Drug Trade
LanguageData.drugTrade_0.desc: One of your settlements is reporting a massive spike in illegal drug use. The leadership suspects that a producer has taken up residence nearby. They request your word on the matter.
LanguageData.drugTrade_1-1.label: Drug Trade
LanguageData.drugTrade_1-2.label: Drug Trade
LanguageData.drugTrade_1-2.desc: Your settlement may be hooked on drugs, but they seem content with their reality. You doubt you'll hear any complaints anytime soon. \n -10% base tax, +25% happiness gain, -25% unrest gain.
LanguageData.drugTrade_2-1.label: Drug Trade
LanguageData.drugTrade_2-2.label: Drug Trade
LanguageData.drugTrade_2-2.desc: The authorities you directed to find the source of the drug production has turned up nothing. Locals are unhappy with the upheaval. The investigators are going to have to lay back for a short while... \n -10% base Tax
LanguageData.drugTrade_3-1.label: Drug Trade
LanguageData.drugTrade_3-1.desc: The drug line has been incorporated into the settlement's official production. A random tithe of drugs will be delivered to you on a 5-day basis. -10% base tax.
LanguageData.drugTrade_4-1.label: Drug Trade
LanguageData.drugTrade_4-1.desc: You have received a new tithe of drugs. Continue production or shut down the facility?
LanguageData.emptyMines.label: Empty Mines
LanguageData.emptyMines.desc: The affected region(s) have been stricken with barren mines. -1 mining base production.
LanguageData.expandedForestry.label: Expanded Forestry
LanguageData.expandedForestry.desc: Some of your settlements have expanded their forestry production this week. +1 logging base production.
LanguageData.foodShortage.label: Food Shortage
LanguageData.foodShortage.desc: There's a widespread food shortage in the affected regions. -1 food base production.
LanguageData.foodSurplus.label: Food Surplus
LanguageData.foodSurplus.desc: Lucky harvests have led to a surplus of food in some settlements. +1 food base production.
LanguageData.forestFire.label: Massive Forest Fire
LanguageData.forestFire.desc: The affected region(s) have forest fires blazing out of control. -1 logging base production.
LanguageData.independencePetitions.label: Independence Petitions
LanguageData.independencePetitions.desc: Due to unrest in your faction, a growing number of your towns have the idea of independence growing. -5 loyalty a day. -5 prosperity a day. +1 unrest a day.
LanguageData.localMilitiasForm.label: Local Militias Form
LanguageData.localMilitiasForm.desc: Due to lowered loyalty, citizens are starting to form local militias and are refusing to hand over their share of taxes. -5% Base Tax Rate.
LanguageData.loyaltyParade.label: Loyalty Parade
LanguageData.loyaltyParade.desc: Some of the settlements in your faction are having a parade in your honor! +1 loyalty a day. -2 unrest a day.
LanguageData.missedSupplyDelivery.label: Missed Supply Delivery
LanguageData.missedSupplyDelivery.desc: The craftsmen in the affected region(s) are suffering from a lack of supplies. -0.5 weapons base production and -0.5 apparel base production.
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_0.label: A Moonlit Ritual
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_0.desc: One of your settlements reports seeing strange figures wader into the forest at night. They are described as wearing strange cosutmes.
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_1-1.label: A Moonlit Ritual
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_1-1.desc: Someone has been sent to investigate...
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_1-1.optionDescription: You receive news that an investigator followed an individual into the woods. They reported back seeing the group perform a series of almost ritualistic carnal acts. Not caring to stick around for it, he returned.
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_2-1.label: A Moonlit Ritual
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_2-1.optionDescription: The investigator reports back that the group returned again. They continued the same activities as the night prior- however, after not leaving, he observed that the group brought out an ornate chest with religious-looking symbols. He stepped closer for a better look, but after stepping on a dead leaf, the group heard him. He fled before they could find him.
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_2-2.label: A Moonlit Ritual
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_2-2.desc: You have decided to leave them be.
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_3-1.label: A Moonlit Ritual
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_3-1.desc: You have ordered the investigation to continue...
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_4-1.label: A Moonlit Ritual
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_4-1.desc: After not reporting back, a search for the investigator was conducted. He was found dead. His body was stripped, his chest cavity split, and his skin carved with runic symbols. The group, whoever they were, were not seen again. Dread falls upon us all. \n Coincidently enough, this week's harvests seem to have spoiled... \n -2 happiness a day, -1 food base production.
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_3-2.label: A Moonlit Ritual
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_3-2.desc: You have ordered the investigation to continue...
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_4-2.label: A Moonlit Ritual
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_4-2.desc: The investigator reported back early in the morning looking quite disheaveled. However, his story says otherwise. They expected him this time and gave an invintation to join. As he explains it, they were performing a fertility ritual to their goddess for hopes of a good harvest. Regardless, he seems to enjoyed himself! \n +1 food base production.
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_3-3.label: A Moonlit Ritual
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_3-3.desc: This week's harvests seem to be unnaturally more plentiful than usual... +.5 food base production.
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_3-4.label: A Moonlit Ritual
LanguageData.moonlitRitual_3-4.desc: This week's harvests seem to be unnaturally less plentiful than usual... -.5 food base production.
LanguageData.settlingDown.label: Settling Down
LanguageData.settlingDown.desc: The citizens of your faction are currently reluctant to expand. Doubled cost to settle.
LanguageData.sparseWildlife.label: Sparse Wildlife
LanguageData.sparseWildlife.desc: The wildlife in the affected region(s) have all but disappeared. -1 animals base production.
LanguageData.struckRichOreVein.label: Struck Rich Ore Vein
LanguageData.struckRichOreVein.desc: Some of your settlements have managed to be lucky enough to strike veins of rich ore in their mines! +1 Base Production Mining.
LanguageData.unexpectedCraftsmanship.label: Unexpected Craftsmanship
LanguageData.unexpectedCraftsmanship.desc: The craftsmen in your settlements have been working unusually well! +0.5 weapons base production and +0.5 apparel base production.
LanguageData.wanderlust.label: Wanderlust
LanguageData.wanderlust.desc: The citizens of your faction are itching to get on the road and settle new lands. Half cost to settle.
LanguageData.woundedAnimal_0.label: Wounded Animal
LanguageData.woundedAnimal_0.desc: A farmer of one of your settlements has brought a wounded animal to your capital. He states that it entered their town and would refuse to leave. The animal looks sickly and on edge. It looks like it could snap at any moment...
LanguageData.woundedAnimal_1-1.label: Wounded Animal
LanguageData.woundedAnimal_1-1.desc: The animal remains calm. Your colonists guide it in without issue.
LanguageData.woundedAnimal_1-2.label: Wounded Animal
LanguageData.woundedAnimal_1-2.desc: As the animal is guided in, it starts to fight against the settlers delivering it. It quickly becomes more and more aggressive and all attempts to calm it start to fail... Several settlers are heavily injured or die. Unfortunately, this will affect production for a period of time. Max workers -3 for five days.
LanguageData.strangeDiscovery_0.label: Strange Discovery
LanguageData.strangeDiscovery_0.desc: Deep in the mines, a strange presence has been felt and the miners have stopped working to investigate it.
LanguageData.strangeDiscovery_1-1.label: Strange Discovery
LanguageData.strangeDiscovery_1-2.label: Strange Discovery
LanguageData.strangeDiscovery_1-3.label: Strange Discovery
LanguageData.strangeDiscovery_2-1.label: Strange Discovery
LanguageData.strangeDiscovery_2-1.desc: After investigating, the miners found several veins of ore all clumped together! Someone must us wanted us to find this... \n +0.25 base mining production. You will receive a small group of ores that the miners dug up.
LanguageData.strangeDiscovery_2-2.label: Strange Discovery
LanguageData.strangeDiscovery_2-2.desc: When your miners investigated, a large insectoid attacked! Luckily, the security force sent with the miners fought off the creature with no casualties. A report of the event has been sent up for investigation.
LanguageData.strangeDiscovery_2-3.label: Strange Discovery
LanguageData.strangeDiscovery_2-3.desc: When your miners investigated, a large insectoid attacked! A few of the miners were killed before the creature was slain. Due to this, a number of workers have decided to stay home after the traumatic event. \n -3 max workers
